title: Efficient antimicrobial applications of two novel supramolecular metallogels derived from a L(+)-tartaric acid low molecular weight gelator
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26354-26361
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03451A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Subhendu Dhibaris, Suchetana Pal, Sangita Some, Kripasindhu Karmakar, Ratnakar Saha, Subham Bhattacharjee, Arpita Roy, Soumya Jyoti Ray, Timothy O. Ajiboye, Somasri Dam, Bidyut Saha
Supramolecular Cd(II) and Hg(II)-metallogels, based on the low molecular weight gelator L(+)-tartaric acid, exhibit potent antibacterial activity against both Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.
